text:
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, your other "Suisei Hoshimachi, To the Shining Stage" and "Roboco-san, Leave It to Me!" gain +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is a ::Hololive:: Character or "#Hololive 0th Gen", choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +2000 Power. (put the revealed card back)
[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Onstage!" is in your Climax Zone, you may from your Waiting Room choose either a Character or a "#Hololive 0th Gen" and return it to your hand.
--None--
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Hololive:: Characters.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Hololive:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other Character is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, if this is in the Back Row, you may pay cost. If so, put that Character Rested in the Slot it was in.
[A] BOND / "Sora Tokino, Stunning Creator" / "Miko Sakura, Forgetful" [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [Discard a Climax from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character or "#Hololive 0th Gen" in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Put a ::Hololive:: Character from your Waiting Room on the bottom of your Clock]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 2 "Roboco-san, Leave It to Me!" in your Waiting Room and put them on the bottom of your Library in any order.
[S] MERGE [Put a "Roboco-san, Proud of Herself" from Stage face-up under this as Marker] Search your Library for up to 1 "Roboco-san, Leave It to Me!", put it in the Slot this is in, put all Markers from under this as well as this card face-up under that "Roboco-san, Leave It to Me!" as Markers in any order, and shuffle your Library.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or by effect of MERGE to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them, put it in your hand, and discard the rest to the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Coexistence with Nature" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage cancel can occur)

[Counter] Choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn, that Character gains the following 2 abilities.
"[C] During battles involving this, You do not take damage from effects of your Opponent's Characters' [A] abilities."
"[C] This cannot Reverse."
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +2500 Power.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] BOND / "Matsuri Natsuiro, Dinosaur Pose" / "Haato Akai, Summer Vacation" [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top 3 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.
[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
--None--

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if there's a Climax in your Climax Zone, you may choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in Stock.

[A] During the turn that this is placed from hand to the Stage, at the start of your Attack Phase, you may put all Characters of all players except this card in their respective Waiting Rooms. If so, this gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may deal 3 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] [(2) Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, your other "Fubuki Shirakami, Splashing Water" and "AkiRose, Which Should I Choose?" gain +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] [(1) Put a ::Hololive:: Character from your Waiting Room to the bottom of your Clock] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character from your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] During your turn, if all your Characters are ::Hololive::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a card from hand to the Stage] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Fox's Potential" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Hololive:: Character, you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 2 ::Hololive:: Characters in your Waiting Room and return them to hand.

[C] If you are Level 2 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [(2) Rest 1 of your 'Fubuki Shirakami, Full of Curiosity' and this] Choose up to 1 'Aki Haato, Summer Vacation' from hand and put it in any Slot on your Stage."
[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if '"Look Only at Me" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, deal 4 Damage to your Opponent, and this gains +1000 Power for the turn. (Damage Cancel can occur)

Put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, choose up to 1 Level X or lower ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. X equals the sum of the Levels of the cards put in the Waiting Room by this effect. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, your other "Ayame Nakiri, Ayame's One Year" and "Subaru Oozora, Full of Energy!" gain +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1500, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Let's Celebrate Together" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Hololive:: Character, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library and search up to 1 Level 1 or higher card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. (Climax Cards are considered Level 0)

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Draw a card, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

If you have "Choco Yuzuki, Spy of the Neighboring Country" and "Ayame Nakiri, FAMS", choose up to 1 "Oozora Subaru, Full of Energy!" in your hand, put it in any Slot on your Stage, and it gains the following 2 abilities until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[C] During Battles involving this, your Opponent may not play BACKUP or Events from hand." "[C] This cannot be chosen as target of Opponent's effects."
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other ::Hololive:: Character is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] BOND "Aqua Minato, Operation Crab Capture" / "Oozora Subaru, Full of Energy!" [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] During your Main Phase, when this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library, put it on top or bottom of your Library, and if you have 1 or less cards in your Clock, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters and Stand them.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)

[C] All your other ::TRAIT:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a "#Hololive 2nd Gen" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If there's a Marker under this, this gains +1 Level and +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, you may put it face-down under this as Marker. (If you don't, put it back where it was)
[A] [(1)] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose the Character Opposite this and another Character in your Opponent's Front Row, then Stand and Swap them.
[C] During your turn, this gains +4000 Power.
--None--
[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] CX COMBO When "To You, Sunflower" is placed in your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row, choose up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room, return it to hand, and this gains +X Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Hololive:: Characters.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] BOND "Okayu Nekomata, Starry Skies" / "Fubuki Shirakami, Kon Kon Kitsune!" [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot.
[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Hololive:: Characters among those cards.

"[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."

[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Hololive:: Character, draw up to a card, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, and put the top card of your Library in your Stock.
[A] CHANGE [(1) Discard 2 ::Hololive:: Characters from your hand to the Waiting Room, return this to your hand] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Fubuki Shirakami, Kon Kon Kitsune!" in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, this gains +2000 Power and the following ability for the turn. "[A] When this Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, if this is in the Front Row, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +4000 Power for the turn.
Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this attacks, if you have 1 or fewer other Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a Level 0 or lower Character, put it in any Slot in the Back Row.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, your other "Korone Inugami, Birthday Party" and "Mio Ookami, Summer Festival and Candy Apples" gain +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] [Discard a Climax from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is either placed from hand to the Stage or placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] Your other Character in the Front Row Center Slot gains +500 Power.
[C] All your other ::Hololive:: Characters gain +500 Power.
--None--

[A] When your other ::Hololive:: Character attacks, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[C] For each of your other Back Row ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +2500 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When this attacks, if "Sky of Shooting Stars" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Opponent's Library, choose up to 2 of them and put them on top of your Opponent's Library in any order, put the rest in their Waiting Room, and this gains +2000 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] All your other "Noel Shirogane, Horizontal Peace Sign" gain +500 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1)] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters and this, and Stand and Swap them."
[A] BOND / "Noel Shirogane, Horizontal Peace Sign" / "Rushia Uruha, Calm Time" [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library to Clock] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library and search up to 1 Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When this attacks, if "In a City with Snow Falling" is in the Climax Zone and you have another ::Hololive:: Character, look at the top card of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character or "#Hololive 3rd Gen", reveal it, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step.

[C] If you are Level 2 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [(2) Rest 1 of your 'Noel Shirogane, Scene of a Fight' and this] Choose up to 1 'Rushia Uruha, Calm Time' from hand and put it in any Slot on your Stage."
[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or via effect of [A] ability of your "Rushia Uruha, Calm Time" to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose up to 3 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and those Characters gain +500 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1) At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, move this to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[A] When this attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose 1 of them and put it on top of your Library, and put the rest in your Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Hololive:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] CX COMBO When "Together Always" is placed to your Climax Zone, if this is in your Front Row and you have another ::Hololive:: Character, choose up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and either return it to your hand or put it in any Slot on your Stage. If you returned it to your hand, choose up to 4 cards in your Opponent's Waiting Room, return them to their Library, and your Opponent Shuffles their Library. If you placed it to Stage, that Character gains +2500 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.
Choose up to 2 Characters in your Waiting Room and return them to your hand, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] This cannot Side Attack.

--None--
